title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 85-2.14 - Consolidation of the presentations of parties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 85-2.14 - Consolidation of the presentations of parties

State Regulations
(a) The consolidation of the presentations of
parties with similar interests shall be governed by section
4.3
(b)(3)
of this

Title; provided, however, that the presiding officer may not require the
consolidation of the representation of governmental bodies or
agencies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
85-2.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
